footer.company_description: We sell designer furniture, lamps & decor across the USA. We offer the best collections by American and European designers.

main_banner.description: 500+ models of cushioned furniture, lamps and accessories.

goods_selection.title: Best-selling Products
goods_selection.description: Our customers' faves of the week

parallax_banner.description: Best styles for your home or office in the most trending colors of 2020. Shop cushioned furniture, lamps, coffee tables and accessories here.

offers.caption: Bring brightness to the interior
offers.title: Get 15% off on colorful 2020 furniture collections.
offers.description:
Set bright accents in your interior. 
Shop the collections of selected designers.

offers.caption: Black & white are always in trend
offers.title: Only black and white furniture collections. Nothing extra.
offers.description:
Top models of furniture & lamps.
Find your inspiration in our B&W collections.

tabs_section.title: Our Fave Finds
tabs_section.description: The best designer products from the 2020 collections.

items.name: Fusion armchair, LEXX
items.description:
It is an incredibly stylish armchair in a trendy mustard color. In it, you can recline comfortably and read a book or work on a laptop.

Dimensions and materials:
25" x 32"
Faux suede, steel

items.name: Aurora armchair, MDS
items.description:
This wide-backed trapezoidal chair will welcome you after or during your hard day and help you relax. It will fit into any interior and is very easy to clean.

Dimensions and materials:
28" x 37"
Faux suede, wood

items.name: Cloud armchair, DIX
items.description:
Simple design and vibrant turquoise color are the hallmarks of this armchair. It is versatile: you can make this armchair a striking accent in your interior or create an island of tranquility in your office.

Dimensions and materials:
28" x 35"
Faux suede, wood

items.name: Jeanine armchair, KUKO
items.description:
This is the very armchair in which you want to drown after a hard day. Wide handrails and padded back allow you to take any position in this armchair.

Dimensions and materials:
28" x 35"
Textile, wood

items.name: 3-piece Minimal, ARM
items.description:
This 3-piece white lamp is a perfect fit for a kitchen or living room. It is a versatile lamp that looks good in any interior.

Material: painted steel.

items.name: Red Drops, KUKO
items.description:
Do you want to fill the room with muted red light? This lamp from one of the best design studios is perfect for you then. The pendant lamp consists of two glass lamps on cords, the height is adjustable.

Materials: steel and glass.

items.name: Delar, Uni Studio
items.description:
This unusual lamp will become a real boon for your interior! It consists of two pineapple-shaped perforated lamps. The height of the pendant lights is adjustable.

Material: steel.

items.name: Bubbles, Udion
items.description:
This elegant luminaire emits diffused warm light. Consists of three pendant lamps on gold-colored mountings, the height is adjustable.

Material: steel.

items.name: Upi table, Landstrom
items.description:
This ultimate white coffee table will fit perfectly into your living room or office. The glossy surface is easy to wipe off.

Dimensions and materials:
10" x 8"
Plastic

items.name: Monica table, Orro
items.description:
This stylish small golden table will perfectly fit into your interior. Thanks to the high sides, no objects will slide off this table.

Dimensions and materials:
18" x 20"
Steel

items.name: Snitch cabinet, ARM
items.description:
A small and neat walnut colored bedside cabinet is made of natural wood. It fits perfectly in any bedroom. There are two shelves inside.

Dimensions and materials:
16" x 19"
Walnut wood

items.name: Hugo table, KUKO studio
items.description:
Stylish side table from one of the best design studios. Functional and minimalistic, it fits perfectly into any interior.

Dimensions and materials:
18" x 25"
Plastic, steel

departments: SOFA - 815 Hutchinson River Pkwy, The Bronx

feedbacks.comment: Next-day delivery surprised me a lot! I thought I would have to wait for weeks! Thank you for the quick processing of my order!
I not only found the perfect sofa at a reasonable price but also stylish lamps which were exactly what I wanted. Thank you, SOFA!
My order arrived really quickly and I was amazed by the quality - PERFECT. I would and have recommended SOFA to others.

products.name: Lord armchair, Miedel Home
products.description:
Do you want to feel comfortable and hide from the bad weather? This armchair is perfect for relaxing with a book or a cup of tea. It also provides extra back support.

Dimensions and materials:
28" x 38"
Faux suede, wood

products.name: Ultimate Green chair, XODO
products.description:
Simple yet functional, this chair is perfect for your minimalistic dining room. It will become a bright spot in your interior design and will awaken your appetite.

Dimensions and materials:
21" x 32"
Plastic

products.name: Valetta armchair, ZIX studio
products.description:
An armchair in which you will feel what real comfort is. The original design will suit both the bedroom and the living room, or even a home office. Available only in pink.

Dimensions and materials:
28" x 35"
Faux suede, steel
